Service Details: Offers physiotherapy services that include manual therapy, acupuncture, vertigo rehabilitation, cervical and lumbar mechanical traction, ultrasound, laser, electrotherapy (Interferential Current, TENS, or Muscle Stimulation), Magnetic Field therapy, heat and ice therapy, exercise prescription, taping, customized braces, use of rehabilitation equipment
